attributes.action: Change the Title for all Women in the UK to be Ms - Abolish the title of Mrs
attributes.additional_details: Women shouldn't need to choose to hide their marital status by using the title Ms. Women are recognized to be their own person and have equal to men and non-binary. However for females to have to make the choice between Mrs, Miss or Ms is subconsciously pressuring them to think about marriage. This is a problem for not only women, but for everyone as is hinders the equality we strive for. Even if you the reader, are not a women think of your mum, sisters, colleagues & friends. Thank you
attributes.background: We kindly ask for the choice of titles for women given their marital status to be abolished, as such information is unimportant and not asked of from men or non-binary. We want the choice of titles on official documents to be changed to Mr, Ms or Mx.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on which titles people use are a matter for individuals.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to review the titles that people are able to select on Government forms and documents, if that's something you would like to happen.
